form.SN:
v ameriški angleščini pišemo
groveling
in
groveled
.

sense.def:
To grovel
pomeni zelo ponižno se vesti do nekoga, ker mislimo, da je pomemben.

seg.quote: They are going to make you grovel.
He sent a letter of grovelling apology to the publisher.

sense.def:
To grovel
pomeni tudi lesti po tleh, na primer zato, da bi nekaj našli.

seg.quote: He was grovelling under his desk for a dropped pencil.
